content.rendered:
Directed By Wanphrang Diengdoh

Written By Wanphrang Diengdoh

Stars Poonam Agarwal (Jay’s Maid). Elizer Bareh (Jay). Deihokhlang Basaiawmoit (Funeral Gambler #5). McDonald Basaiawmoit (Person #2 at Beijing Chinese Bar). Sainborlang Basiawmoit (Drunken Lout). Shashank Shekhar Das (Barber). Aeden Ewan Diengdoh (Young Jay). Jonathan Dkhar (Funeral Gambler #1). Duh Duh (Dolores’ Maid). Bhaskar Goswami (Delivery Man). Adil Hussain (Shem). Annecia Jyrwa (Thei). Nicholas Jyrwa (Person #1 at Beijing Chinese Bar). Larihunshisha K. Kharai (Person #1 at Gambling Den). Dawan Kharkongor (Magician). Iba Kharkongor (Journalist #1 at Hospital). Rana Kharkongor (Shaman). Mattishabakordor Kharnari (Funeral Attendant #9). Phidashisha Kharpran (Funeral Attendant #8). Ambrosius Kharsohmoh (Funeral Gambler #2). Gordon Kharsyiemiong (Funeral Attendant #1). Heimonmi O’Rayne Kharsyntiew (Cow Herder #3) . Robina Khongsti (Thlen Lady). Mary Khyriem (Old Pahsyntiew). Donald Khyriemmujat (Cow Herder #2). Leocardinus Kon (Person #3 at Beijing Chinese Bar). Amar Kumar (Wedding Attendant #2). Ma Lit (Guy #1 at Local Bar). Wallamkupar Lyngba (Journalist #2 at Hospital). Aiban Nangsan Lyngdoh (Funeral Gambler #3). Freddie Lyngdoh (Guy #2 at Local Bar). Jefferson Lyngdoh (Guy #3 at Local Bar). Shaan L. Lyngdoh (Person #4 at Gambling Den). Tyrel Lyngdoh (Cow Herder #1). Nangshkembor Majaw (Wedding Attendant #3). Khrawbok Mannar (Person #4 at Beijing Chinese Bar). Precious Micky Marak (Police Constable). Ibanylla Marbaniang (Wedding Attendant #1). Valerie Joan Marbaniang (Shem’s Mother). Yonda Marbaniang (Dolores Dkhar). Banatimon Mawlong (Funeral Attendant #5). Abansara Mawrie (Funeral Attendant #7). Lumbor Mawsor (Albart). Monalisa (Person #3 at Gambling Den). Merlvin Mukhim (Bic). Enzeelia Mynsong (‘Lei Shyllong Daughter #3). Zgyaana Mynsong (‘Lei Shyllong Daughter #4). Randell Nongkhlaw (Ziggy). Russell Nongkhlaw (Funeral Gambler #6). Saintisuk Nonglait (Lady at Local Bar). Lamphrangsngi Nongphun (Funeral Attendant #2). Plishanri Nongrum (Funeral Gambler #4). Linda Nongsiej (Funeral Attendant #4). Sanjay Pradhan (Bihari Balram). Ankush Saikia (Inspector). Goldenstar Suchiang (Bald Gambler). Abeni E.M. Syiem (‘Lei Shyllong Daughter #2). Ariana Z. Syiem (‘Lei Shyllong Daughter #1). Dawiat Syiem (Esther). Natania Y. Syiem (Young Pahsyntiew). Kenny Lyngdoh Talang (Banker). Lakhindar Thakur (Barber 2). Allen Thangkhiew (Funeral Attendant #3). Tina Collete Thangkhiew (Person #2 at Gambling Den). Wandakmen Warjri (Funeral Attendant #6)

Language Khasi. Hindi. English.

Producer Sweety Pala

Production Maiti Pictures. Reddur Productions
